title: Wait
lyrics:
Neon jigeum museun saeng-gaghae?
Naneun neoleul saeng-gaghae
Nae sesang-eun ontong neolo gadeughae
Gieogna? imamttae seolledeon neowa na babe
Yunanhido banjjag-ideon hayan gyejeol-i

Jeo dadhin chang-eul neom-eo bul-eowa

Halu jong-il neol geulimyeo ttoggat-eun jalil

Gidalineun nae mam-eul alkka



Nun-i ol geos gat-eunde (bakk-eul bwa eoneusae)

Neomu neuj-eumyeon an dwae (yagsoghae)

Uliga mannaneun gil-i eosgalliji anhge

Now all I do (All I do)

All I do is wait



Chuwil manh-i taneun neo

Gamgin igsughadan neo

I gyeoul-i negen dajeonghaess-eum johgess-eo

Issjanh-a geuge nae sowon jung hanaya babe



Oneulttala wae ileohge bogo sip-eunji

Neol josimseule kkeonaebodaga

Gyeondil manhae sajin sog geuliun eolgul-i

Naleul bomyeo us-eojunikka



Nun-i ol geos gat-eunde (bakk-eul bwa eoneusae)

Neomu neuj-eumyeon an dwae (yagsoghae)

Uliga mannaneun gil-i eosgalliji anhge

Now all I do (All I do)

All I do is wait



I’m waiting for you

Wait

I’m waiting for you

Wait

I’m waiting for you

You



Nun-i ol geos gat-eunde

Neomu neuj-eumyeon an dwae (yagsoghae)

Uliga mannaneun gil-i eosgalliji anhge

Now all I do (All I do)

All I do

Oh All I do (All I do)

All I do

All I do

All I do is wait
